onvif_user_setup_h.addTxt1: Provide the following information for each new ONVIF user:
onvif_user_setup_h.addTxt4: Confirm Password - Re-enter the password to confirm.
onvif_user_setup_h.addTxt5: User group - Click the appropriate radio button to define the access rights for the user. The level of access can be described as follows:
onvif_user_setup_h.addTxt6: Media user - Allows access to the video stream only.
onvif_user_setup_h.addTxt7: Operator - An Operator can view the video stream, create and modify event types, and also modify all the settings not included in the System options
onvif_user_setup_h.addTxt8: Administrator - An Administrator has unrestricted access to the whole product and its setup Tools, and can determine the registration of all other users.

onvif_users_h.intro_Txt1: ONVIF (Open Network Video Interface Forum) is a global interface standard that makes it easier for end users, integrators, consultants, and manufacturers to take advantage of the possibilities offered by network video technology. ONVIF enables interoperablity between different vendor products, increased flexibility, reduced cost and future-proof systems.
onvif_users_h.intro_Txt2: By creating a user you automatically enable ONVIF communication. Use the user name and password with all ONVIF communication with the product. For more information see the Developer pages at www.axis.com
onvif_users_h.Subtitle: Users list
onvif_users_h.list_Txt1: The Users list shows the user name and user group of all the ONVIF users currently configured in the product.
onvif_users_h.list_Txt2: To create a new user, click Add. To change an existing user, select the user in the list and click Modify... To delete a user, select it and click Remove.
